name: Space Crisis (Placeholder Projects)
description:
Help the Astronauts not to die a miserable death and survive an invasion in their spaceship.

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
Shift - Dash
E - Interact
MOUSE - Aim, Shoot and Grab

CREDITS

Background Music: Digestive Biscuit by Kubbi - Youtube: Free Music

TIPS

• Your main goal is to save all your fellow crewmates, the icons are relative to their states.

► Lightened: Safe

► Unlightened: In Danger

► Grey Border: Dead

• Your ending will depend if you saved all of them.

• You can only grab when your weapon has no charges (the little ball flying close to you).

• The Shot or Dash will work only if you have grabbed an enemy with your weapon.

• The Dash will go further based on your current jump force, holding the jump button will make the dash work with more force.

• You can use the yellow boxes that respawn over time to restore the charge of your weapon.

• Besides the force field turret, all the enemies can be destroyed by your shot.

• You can't grab or destroy turrets with force field around them.
